content: रिच् {vI.v} {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> (रिणक्ति, रिंक्ते, रिक्त) {@--1@} To empty, evacuate, clear, purge; रिणच्मि जलधेस्तोयं <ls>Bk. 6. 36</ls>; आविर्भूते शशिनि तमसा रिच्यमानेव रात्रिः <ls>V. 1. 8</ls>; तिमिररिच्यमानं पूर्वदिङ्मुखमालोकसुभगं दृश्यते <ls>V. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To deprive of, make destitute of. {@--3@} To separate, divide. {@--4@} To give or deliver up, part with. {@--5@} To bequeath (usually in {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%}, see रिक्त). {vII.v} {c1c} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> (रेचति, रेचयति, रेचित) {@--1@} To divide, separate, disjoin. {@--2@} To abandon, leave. {@--3@} To join, mix. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To evacuate, make empty. {@--2@} To discharge, emit (as breath). {@--3@} To leave, abandon.
